description:
Currently working as a middleweight developer at a Nottingham-based agency. I have over three years industry experience working on both greenfield and brownfield projects. Areas of specialization include frontend technologies, technical SEO, and web performance.

I enjoy working on a wide range of projects that require a variety of skills that allow me to utilize my expertise to deliver high-quality results and expand my knowledge while staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

personal: When I'm not working I'm probably having to throw a ball for Rolo, our minuature daschund. I love to travel with most recent trips to NYC for christmas and then skiing down the slopes of the Panorama mountain resort in Canada.
